mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attendance( progress_id, status, times, createdAt ) select g.progress_id, REPEAT('0',times), p.times, now() from tbl_lesson l inner join tbl_progress g on l.lesson_id = g.lesson_id left join tbl_program p on l.program_id = p.program_id where l.lesson_id = #{lessonId} and g.deletedAt is null
mapper.select:
select pr.title, pr.times, ps.child_name, l.lesson_id, l.day, l.lesson_time, l.lesson_length, l.start_date, l.end_date, a.status as attendance_status, a.attendance_id from tbl_attendance as a
left join tbl_progress as ps on a.progress_id = ps.progress_id and ps.deletedAt is null left join tbl_lesson as l on ps.lesson_id = l.lesson_id left join tbl_program as pr on l.program_id = pr.program_id
where ps.parent_id = #{parent_id} and l.state = 'inProgress'

select pr.title, pr.times, l.lesson_id, l.day, l.lesson_time, l.lesson_length, l.start_date, l.end_date, ps.child_name, at.status as attendance_status, at.attendance_id from tbl_program pr left join tbl_lesson l on pr.program_id = l.program_id left join tbl_progress ps on l.lesson_id = ps.lesson_id and ps.deletedAt is null inner join tbl_attendance at on at.progress_id = ps.progress_id where pr.student_id = #{studentId} and l.state = 'inProgress'
mapper.update: update tbl_attendance set status = #{status}, updatedAt = now() where attendance_id = #{attendanceId}

update tbl_attendance as a
inner join tbl_progress p on a.progress_id = p.progress_id
set deleteAt = now()
where p.lesson_id = #{lessonId}
